text: I am using xmlrpclib.ServerProxy to make RPC calls to a remote server.
If there is not a network connection to the server it takes the default 10 seconds to return a socket.gaierror to my program.
This is annoying when doing development without a network connection, or if the remote server is down.
Is there a way to update the timeout on my ServerProxy object?
I can't see a clear way to get access to the socket to update it.
